paragraphs.zh-tw: 每一年有 571,230,000 磅紙手巾每一年有 571,230,000 磅紙手巾被美國人所使用被美國人所使用如果我們能等下，數據錯了是每年 130 億磅
paragraphs.en: Five hundred seventy-one million two hundred thirty thousand pounds of paper towels are used by Americans every year. If we could -- correction, wrong figure -- 13 billion used every year.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 如果我們可以減少紙手巾的使用一人一天一張就會減少 571,230,000 磅的使用量我們做得到的
paragraphs.en: If we could reduce the usage of paper towels, one paper towel per person per day, 571,230,000 pounds of paper not used. We can do that.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 現在有各種紙手巾抽取器一張折三折的紙巾，人們一般都拿兩到三張
paragraphs.en: Now there are all kinds of paper towel dispensers. There's the tri-fold. People typically take two or three.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 也有直接從機器上撕下來的人們拿 1、2、3、4 張
paragraphs.en: There's the one that cuts it, that you have to tear off. People go one, two, three, four, tear.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 這麼多張，對吧？這是已經被裁切過的人們拿 1、2、3、4 張
paragraphs.en: This much, right? There's the one that cuts itself. People go, one, two, three, four.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 或同樣的，是用回收紙做的你會拿 5 張，因為它們吸水力不好事實上，你用一張紙手巾就夠了
paragraphs.en: Or there's the same thing, but recycled paper, you have to get five of those because they're not as absorbant, of course. The fact is, you can do it all with one towel.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 關鍵在於兩個字：這半邊的人，你們的字是「甩」讓我聽看看，甩，大聲點觀眾：甩
paragraphs.en: The key, two words: This half of the room, your word is "shake." Let's hear it. Shake. Louder. Audience: Shake.

paragraphs.zh-tw: Joe Smith：你們的字是「折」觀眾：折JS：再說一次
paragraphs.en: Joe Smith: Your word is "fold." Audience: Fold. JS: Again.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 觀眾：折JS：再大聲一點觀眾：甩、折
paragraphs.en: Audience: Fold. JS: Really loud. Audience: Shake. Fold.
JS: Okay. Wet hands. Shake -- one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, 10, 11, 12.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 為什麼12下？12使徒，12部族12黃道星座、12個月這是我最喜歡的：這是用一個音節可以說出數目最大的字三折，折
paragraphs.en: Why 12? Twelve apostles, twelve tribes, twelve zodiac signs, twelve months. The one I like the best: It's the biggest number with one syllable. Tri-fold. Fold ...

paragraphs.zh-tw: 乾了觀眾：甩
paragraphs.en: Dry. Audience: Shake.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 折JS：已經裁好的。折，折很重要因為他讓水份留在紙的空隙裡
paragraphs.en: Fold. JS: Cuts itself. Fold. The fold is important because it allows interstitial suspension.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 你不用記得這部分，但相信我觀眾：甩、折
paragraphs.en: You don't have to remember that part, but trust me. Audience: Shake. Fold.

paragraphs.zh-tw: JS：已經裁好的有趣的事情是我的手比其他用三四張紙的人還乾因為它們沒有好好擦指縫
paragraphs.en: JS: Cuts itself. You know the funny thing is, I get my hands drier than people do with three or four, because they can't get in between the cracks.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 如果你覺得這種紙不好觀眾：甩、折
paragraphs.en: If you think this isn't as good... Audience: Shake. Fold.

paragraphs.zh-tw: JS：現在，這是充滿技巧的發明你必須要甩你的手水就會被甩掉紙巾變得太大張
paragraphs.en: JS: Now, there's now a real fancy invention, it's the one where you wave your hand and it kicks it out. It's way too big a towel.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 讓我告訴你一個祕密如果你動作很快，非常快我可以證明給你看這是從本大樓取得的半張紙巾
paragraphs.en: Let me tell you a secret. If you're really quick, if you're really quick -- and I can prove this -- this is half a towel from the dispenser in this building.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 怎麼弄？只要機器一把紙巾送出來，你馬上撕掉機器會馬上停止
paragraphs.en: How? As soon as it starts, you just tear it off. It's smart enough to stop.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 你就可以只拿半張紙巾了觀眾：甩、折
paragraphs.en: And you get half a towel. Audience: Shake. Fold.

paragraphs.zh-tw: JS：現在，我們一起說甩、折你這一生都將會記住這兩字每當你拿紙手巾的時候
paragraphs.en: JS: Now, let's all say it together. Shake. Fold. You will for the rest of your life remember those words every time you pick up a paper towel.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 記住，一年中一人一天一張紙手巾省 571,230,000 磅的紙，數量不可小覷明年，教你用廁所衛生紙
paragraphs.en: And remember, one towel per person for one year -- 571,230,000 pounds of paper. No small thing. And next year, toilet paper.

title: Joe Smith How To Use A Paper Towel
